name: Super Smash balls
description:
Summary

Super Smash Balls is a 1v1 platform fighter where each player controls a ball that relentlessly attacks the other ball in order to knock it off the stage. Choose your loadout from a selection of 5 options: Shield, Sword, Gun, Pad, and Dash, each having interesting gameplay mechanics of their own and combining for interesting engagements as well. (You will need 2 controllers)

Controls:

Movement is done with the left stick. The "A" attack you select will be bound to your "A" button, your right stick, and the 2 bumpers. The "B" attack will be bound to the "B" button and the 2 triggers. (Nintendo layout)
